parameters.name: Accept-Encoding
parameters.description: The compression format of the data that the server returns. Only the lz4 format is supported.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of LogGroups to return. The value must be an integer from 1 to 1000.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The cursor that specifies the start position from which to read data.

parameters.name: end_cursor
parameters.description: The cursor that specifies the end position at which to stop reading data.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The filter statement in the Structured Process Language (SPL) syntax. For more information, see [SPL instructions](~~2536530~~).

parameters.name: shardId
parameters.description: The ID of the shard in the Logstore.
